head.title: World Briefing | Asia: Afghanistan: Blast Wounds 4 U.S. Soldiers

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Asia: Afghanistan: Blast Wounds 4 U.S. Soldiers

block.p: Four American soldiers on patrol were wounded in a roadside explosion near the southeastern town of Ghazni, the United States military said in a statement. An Afghan interpreter was also wounded. Troops defused three other explosive devices around the country. The attack was the latest in a surge of violence and intimidation against the American coalition and the government in recent weeks as preparations for parliamentary elections begin.
